goals__remit:
Anyone who thinks forwards concentrates their whole imagination on what might be tomorrow and how to master the challenges of tension between the dynamically political changing environment, the binding commitments (strategic guidelines, norms, laws and regulations), technologies and business life. 
 
KARL KRONER KG (hereinafter referred to as KKUB) is both a think tank and a consulting company providing expert opinions, expertises, benchmarks as well as systemic and strategic advices regarding to: 
 
  > Compliance Management 
  > Organizational Development 
  > Corporate Development 
  > Industrial Clustering 
  > Interest Representation (Lobbying) 
 
All this development measures take place in compliance with the relevant binding obligations of the respective organization. The compliance checks can be carried out in the following areas of law: 
 
Constitutional Right, Corporate Law, Financial Law as well as the following areas of Administrative Law:  
 
Building Law, Chemicals Law, Dangerous Goods Law, Driver's Rights, Environmental Law, Explosives Law, Gasoline Lead Law, Health and Safety Law, Home Employment Law, Immission Protection Law, Maternity Protection Law, Medical Devices, Operational Safety Law, Productoriented environmental protection, Product safety law, Radiation Protection Law, Regulation of Administrative Law, Trade Inspectorate, Waste Law, Water Law, Working Time Protection, Workplace Law, Youth Employment Protection Law. 
 
With this range of services, the KKUB is aimed at entrepreneurs and the management of companies of the manufacturing industry. 
 
The aim of the consulting services is to solve thinking blocks and to develop complex innovative solutions for challenging tasks that sustainably increase the substantial value of our clients. 
 
With the contents of this appearance in the EU Transparency Register, we want to give you an overview of our range of services, the goal of our consulting services and our self-image.  
 
In addition, this appearance should help to gain their confidence in the performance and innovative strength of KKUB and pave the way for an exchange of ideas and a trusting cooperation. 
 
We thank you for your attention and are available for further questions.
